A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Major Plot holes everywhere. Rian Johnson clearly doesn't know how space works. Disjoined plots\, no observance to established lore\, plots\, or established ways the force works. Feels like the Avengers in Space. Literally no character development because Rey is a Mary Sue that can do things with ease that other Jedi like Yoda have to strain to do\, with no training whatsoever. And Luke\, fuck Rian Johnson for taking the biggest inspiration from my childhood and shitting on it. That wasn't Luke.
